meanings.definition: A large flightless bird native to Australia, similar to an ostrich.
meanings.sent1: The emeu ran swiftly across the field.
meanings.sent2: I saw an emeu at the zoo last week.
meanings.sent3: Why did the emeu refuse to play hide and seek? Because it always stands out!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the call of an emeu.
meanings.sent5: The emeu's powerful legs propelled it forward with grace.

meanings.definition: The soft, light-brown feathers of the emeu.
meanings.sent1: She collected a few emeu feathers for her art project.
meanings.sent2: The emeu's feathers were used to make beautiful decorations.
meanings.sent3: The emeu feathers floated gently in the breeze like delicate clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her pillow felt as soft as emeu feathers against her cheek.
meanings.sent5: The emeu's feathers shimmered in the sunlight, creating a mesmerizing display.
